name: The Stock Trading Reality
what_you_do: ClayTrader provides education and resources for individuals looking to master stock trading and achieve financial freedom through various programs and community support.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes aspiring traders and individuals seeking financial independence, primarily B2C.
current_projects: Free Live Online Event on June 20th
bio: Helping guide new and/or struggling traders since 2013.
business_focus: ClayTrader provides education and resources for individuals looking to master stock trading and achieve financial freedom through various programs and community support.

jv_history.partner_name: ‎The Stock Trading Reality Podcast on Apple Podcasts
jv_history.source_quote: ClayTrader Stock Trading Reality Podcast. Our show, hosted by ClayTrader, is designed to motivate and inspire traders of all experience levels. We interview REAL traders, discuss their trading journey
